author: rdonkin
msg: Fix for bug #10478. Submitted by Roland Huss.

author: rdonkin
msg: Added workaround for jvm issue with accessing public methods coded in default access superclasses via reflaction from a public access subclass instance. This workaround will will most likely fail if the code is run with right security permissions. Workaround suggested by Ben Walding.

author: jstrachan
msg: Minor patch to refactor the implementation code a touch.
Firstly there's a patch so that this class works on HsqlDb which does not support ResultSetMetaData.getColumnClassName();
Also new Factory and Strategy methods have been added to make it easier to extend this class to, use different DynaProperty implementations and to use different class loading strategies.
Finally the class loading of column types will use the ClassLoader used to load this library, rather than the system class loader.

author: bayard
msg: Finally :) The BeanComparator submitted by Eric Pugh back in June or sometime.
With reformatting, removal of (Comparable) casting, renaming of compareProperty

author: rdonkin
msg: Added enhancement #12247. This makes null parameter arrays pass into invokeXXX methods to be treated as empty arrays. This improves consistancy with basic reflection.
